alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of southeastern Putnam County through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower and thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Fruitland, or near Pomona Park, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pomona Park, Fruitland, Welaka and Georgetown. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
